text: Kenneth Eugene Frease III (born October 18, 1989) is an American professional basketball player for BBC Monthey of the Swiss Basketball League. He played college basketball for Xavier University. ==Career== On August 3, 2012, Frease signed with Tigers Tübingen of Germany for the 2012–13 season.Tubingen Walter- Tigers tab rookie Kenny Frease In July 2013, Frease joined the Milwaukee Bucks for the 2013 NBA Summer League.Bucks Announce 2013 Summer League On August 3, 2013, he signed with Artland Dragons of Germany for the 2013–14 season.Artland Dragons officially sign Kenny Frease In July 2014, Frease re-joined the Bucks for the 2014 NBA Summer League.Bucks Announce 2014 Summer League Roster On August 30, 2014, he signed with Yeşilgiresun Belediye of the Turkish TBL2.Yesilgiresun signs Kenny Frease In January 2015, he left Yeşilgiresun and signed with his former team Artland Dragons for the rest of the season.Kenny Frease signs back with Artland Dragons On June 25, 2015, Frease signed with Basketball Löwen Braunschweig of Germany for the 2015–16 season.Basketball Braunschweig lands Kenneth Frease, parts ways with Visser On August 28, 2016, Frease signed with Science City Jena of Germany for the 2016–17 season.Siegreicher Einstand für Center Kenny Frease mit Science City Jena He played for SA Massagno Basket in 2018 and averaged 12.8 points, 3.3 assists and 5.5 rebounds per game. On August 4, 2018, Frease signed with the Swiss team BBC Monthey.Kenny Frease signs with BBC Monthey ==References== ==External links== *FIBA profile *Xavier bio Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Switzerland Category:American expatriate basketball people in Germany Category:American expatriate basketball people in Turkey Category:American men's basketball players Category:Artland Dragons players Category:Basketball Löwen Braunschweig players Category:Basketball players from Ohio Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Sportspeople from Massillon, Ohio Category:Science City Jena players Category:Tigers Tübingen players Category:Xavier Musketeers men's basketball players Category:Yeşilgiresun Belediye players
title: Kenny Frease
